restorePasswordDescription: Use the form below to restore a forgotten password. If the specified mailbox exists, a link will be sent to it to change the account password to the one you specified.
restorePasswordSuccess: The procedure to change the password is successfully started. If you specified a valid mailbox, you will receive a link to confirm the password change to the one you specified.
passwordHelpText: Enter a new password for the account, repeat twice for verification
